publicwhip.spmotion: *S1M-193# Brian Adam: Detoxification and Rehabilitation services in north east Scotland—That the Parliament encourages the local government and health authorities in north east Scotland to provide detoxification and rehabilitation facilities within the area and further calls upon the Scottish Executive to make the resources available to allow early provision of such facilities. Supported by: Richard Lochhead*, Irene McGugan*

S1M-193# Brian Adam: Detoxification and Rehabilitation Services in North East Scotland—That the Parliament encourages the local government and health authorities in north east Scotland to provide detoxification and rehabilitation facilities within the area and further calls upon the Scottish Executive to make the resources available to allow early provision of such facilities. Supported by: Richard Lochhead, Irene McGugan

S1M-193# Brian Adam: Detoxification and Rehabilitation Services in North East Scotland—That the Parliament encourages the local government and health authorities in north east Scotland to provide detoxification and rehabilitation facilities within the area and further calls upon the Scottish Executive to make the resources available to allow early provision of such facilities. Supported by: Richard Lochhead, Irene McGugan
S1M-193# Detoxification and Rehabilitation Services in North East Scotland (lodged on 6 October 1999) Mr Mike Rumbles*

S1M-193# Brian Adam: Detoxification and Rehabilitation Services in North East Scotland—That the Parliament encourages the local government and health authorities in north east Scotland to provide detoxification and rehabilitation facilities within the area and further calls upon the Scottish Executive to make the resources available to allow early provision of such facilities. Supported by: Richard Lochhead, Irene McGugan, Mr Mike Rumbles

S1M-193# Brian Adam: Detoxification and Rehabilitation Services in North East Scotland—That the Parliament encourages the local government and health authorities in north east Scotland to provide detoxification and rehabilitation facilities within the area and further calls upon the Scottish Executive to make the resources available to allow early provision of such facilities. Supported by: Richard Lochhead, Irene McGugan, Mr Mike Rumbles
S1M-193# Detoxification and Rehabilitation Services in North East Scotland (lodged on 6 October 1999) Andrew Wilson*
S1M-193# Detoxification and Rehabilitation Services in North East Scotland (lodged on 6 October 1999) Nora Radcliffe*

S1M-193# Brian Adam: Detoxification and Rehabilitation Services in North East Scotland-That the Parliament encourages the local government and health authorities in north east Scotland to provide detoxification and rehabilitation facilities within the area and further calls upon the Scottish Executive to make the resources available to allow early provision of such facilities. Supported by: Richard Lochhead, Irene McGugan, Mr Mike Rumbles, Andrew Wilson, Nora Radcliffe

S1M-193# Brian Adam: Detoxification and Rehabilitation Services in North East Scotland—That the Parliament encourages the local government and health authorities in north east Scotland to provide detoxification and rehabilitation facilities within the area and further calls upon the Scottish Executive to make the resources available to allow early provision of such facilities. Supported by: Richard Lochhead, Irene McGugan, Mr Mike Rumbles, Andrew Wilson, Nora Radcliffe
S1M-193# Detoxification and Rehabilitation Services in North East Scotland (lodged on 6 October 1999) Mr John McAllion*, Mr David Davidson*, Mr Andrew Welsh*

S1M-193# Brian Adam: Detoxification and Rehabilitation Services in North East Scotland—That the Parliament encourages the local government and health authorities in north east Scotland to provide detoxification and rehabilitation facilities within the area and further calls upon the Scottish Executive to make the resources available to allow early provision of such facilities. Supported by: Richard Lochhead, Irene McGugan, Mr Mike Rumbles, Andrew Wilson, Nora Radcliffe, Mr John McAllion, Mr David Davidson, Mr Andrew Welsh
